text: (avaru) bhumiyalli mereda ahankara hagu (avara) dustasancugale adakke karanavagiddavu. Dusta sancugalu, avugalannu racisuvavara palige ghatakavagiruttave. Avaru, kayuttiruvudu gata kaladavarige anvayisalada sanhitegagiye tane? Allahana sanhiteyalli nivu yavude badalavaneyannu kanalariri. Mattu nivu allahana niyamadalli yavude parivartaneyannu kanalariri
